Package com.example.cmput301f18t26.icare.Controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataController
    DataController is used for caching and maintaining all persistent data associated with our app.
    ProblemFactory
    Creates a new problem with the arguments passed in and returns it.
    RecordFactory
    This factor produces records, either UserRecord or Record is returned depending on the type of record that is needed.
    SearchController
    SearchController is used for interacting with our ElasticSearch instance.
    SearchController.AddImage
    Adds an image(stored as a base64 string) to the ES server.
    SearchController.AddProblem
    Adds a new problem to the server.
    SearchController.AddRecord
    Adds a record to the new ES server.
    SearchController.AddUser
    Class adds a user to ES.
    SearchController.CheckConnection
    This class checks to see if our app is connected to the internet for making decisions about whether to use SearchController/ElasticSearch or to use the local cache in DataController True = online
    SearchController.CheckIfUserNameExists
    Checks if a user with a username already exists on the ES server.
    SearchController.DeleteProblem
    Deletes a problem from the ES server.
    SearchController.DeleteRecordsAssociatedWithProblem
    When a problem is deleted, all the associated records also need to be deleted.
    SearchController.GetImage
    Grabs the image(stored as a base64 string) from the ES server.
    SearchController.GetPatients
    Gets a list of patients linked with a care provider from ES.
    SearchController.GetProblems
    Gets a list of patients for a patient from ES.
    SearchController.GetRecords
    Get all records associated with the problemUID
    SearchController.GetRecordUsingUID
    Gets details on a record with the passed in UID.
    SearchController.GetUserInfoUsingUId
    Class was created to fetch a user for a given UID
    SearchController.SearchPatients
    Searches for a list of patients using their username.
    SearchController.SignInUser
    Checks to see if the username is valid or the single use code is valid and logs the user in.
    SearchController.UpdateInformationForUser
    Method updates an existing user on Elasticsearch.
    UserFactory
    This factory produces CareProviders and Patients.
